overview: Denny breaks up with his fianc√©e Jean to marries wealthy Flora. When Jean is fired from her job she decides to market the face cream she invented. After sending it to twelve rich woman, only Flora decides to invest in the business.  As Denny has no job, the girls give him an office at the factory. The business takes off, but Jean finds that she is still in love with Denny and Denny seems to forget he is married to Flora.
tagline: TO the HIGHEST BIDDER! - the charm secrets that land that man
title: Beauty for the Asking
